content: To share your form and assign roles to the room participants for filling it out, please create a Virtual Data Room.

comment.text:
"To provide guidance on creating a Virtual Data Room for sharing forms and assigning roles to room participants." 

(This translation key is used in a button label or dialog related to form creation or assignment of roles.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content emphasizes 'To share your form and assign roles'. The Arabic translation, while technically correct, lacks the nuance of 'sharing' and the proactive implication of assigning roles. It reads more like a general instruction rather than a clear action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لمشاركة النموذج وتحديد صلاحيات للمشاركين عند تعبئته، يُرجى إنشاء غرفة بيانات افتراضية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'عند تعبئته' (when filling it out) feels a bit clunky. A more fluid phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لمشاركة النموذج وتحديد صلاحيات للمشاركين لتعبئته، يُرجى إنشاء غرفة بيانات افتراضية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'To share your form...' is not accurately reflected by 'Lütfən, formanızı paylaşmaq üçün...'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the purpose of creating the VDR – to facilitate sharing the form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formanızı paylaşmaq və formanı doldurmaq üçün virtual məlumat otağı yaradın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit awkward. Combining the two actions (creating the VDR and assigning roles) into a single clause would improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Formanızı paylaşmaq və formanı doldurmaq üçün virtual məlumat otağı yaradın və otaq iştirakçılarına rollar təyin edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Para compartir su formulario y asignar roles a los participantes de la sala para su rellenado, por favor cree una sala de datos virtuales' is slightly awkward. 'rellenado' is a bit formal and 'sala de datos virtuales' can be improved to 'habitación de datos virtual' or 'sala virtual de datos' for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para compartir su formulario y asignar roles a los participantes de la sala para completarlo, por favor cree una habitación de datos virtual.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ole hyvä ja luo" (please create) sounds overly formal and unnatural in this context. A more natural phrasing would be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Luo virtuaalinen tiedonhuone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'huoneen osallistujille' (for the room's participants) is grammatically correct but feels slightly awkward.  'Huoneen osallistujat' (room participants) is more common and reads better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: huoneen osallistujat

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "lomakkeen täyttöä varten" (for filling out the form) is slightly redundant. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: lomakkeen täyttämiseen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ձևը կիսվելու և մասնակիցներին դերեր նշանակելու համար խնդրում ենք ստեղծել Վիրտուալ Տվյալների Սենյակ։" is a bit literal and sounds awkward in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the purpose of creating the VDR.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մասնակիցներին դերեր նշանակելու և ձևը կիսելու համար, խնդրում ենք ստեղծել Վիրտուալ Տվյալների Սենյակ։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To share your form and assign roles to the room participants for filling it out' is not fully captured by 'フォームを共有し、参加者に役割を割り当てるには'. It implies a more active assignment of roles and sharing, rather than a simple instruction to do so.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: フォームを共有し、記入者の役割を割り当てるには、バーチャルデータルームを作成してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks a polite or formal ending, which is often expected in Japanese instructions or informational text.  It reads somewhat abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: フォームを共有し、記入者の役割を割り当てるには、バーチャルデータルームを作成してください。お願いいたします。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "양식을 공유하고 양식 작성을 위해 룸 참여자에게 역할을 할당하려면" is a bit awkward and could be more naturally translated. "양식 작성을 위해" is redundant since sharing a form inherently implies it's for writing (filling out).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 양식을 공유하고 룸 참여자에게 역할을 할당하려면 가상 데이터 룸을 생성하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a passive voice construction that isn't as direct as the English version. It's understandable but not the most natural Korean phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 양식을 공유하고 룸 참여자에게 역할을 할당하려면 가상 데이터 룸을 만드세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ເພື່ອກາບແບ່ງແບບຟອມ" is not the most natural translation of "To share your form". "ແບ່ງປັນແບບຟອມ" would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແບ່ງປັນແບບຟອມ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Virtual Data Room' as 'ຫ້ອງຖ້າຂໍ້ມູນດິຈິຕອນ' is literal and less common in Lao. A more commonly understood phrasing might be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຫ້ອງຂໍ້ມູນອອນໄລ໌

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and can be improved for better readability. Breaking it into two sentences might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພື່ອກາບແບ່ງແບບຟອມ ແລະມອບບົດບາດໃຫ້ຜູ້ເຂົ້າຮ່ວມຫ້ອງຖ້າຂໍ້ມູນເພື່ອຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນ, ກະລຸນາສ້າງຫ້ອງຂໍ້ມູນອອນໄລ໌ (Virtual Data Room).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "for filling it out" is slightly awkward. It can be improved to flow better in Dutch.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maak een Virtuele Data Kamer om uw formulier te delen en rollen toe te wijzen aan de deelnemers in de kamer voor het invullen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence could be restructured for better flow and readability in Dutch. Adding a conjunction to link the two actions improves the cadence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maak een Virtuele Data Kamer om uw formulier te delen, en rollen toe te wijzen aan de deelnemers in de kamer voor het invullen ervan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'room participants' is translated as 'członkom pokoju'. While technically correct, it sounds awkward in Polish. A more natural phrasing would be 'osobom uczestniczącym w pokoju' or 'użytkownikom pokoju'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby udostępnić swój formularz i przypisać role osobom uczestniczącym w pokoju w celu jego wypełnienia, utwórz wirtualny pokój danych.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "para o preencher" (to fill it out) is slightly awkward in this context. It's technically correct but less natural than phrasing it as 'para preenchê-lo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para partilhar o seu formulário e atribuir funções aos participantes da sala para preenchê-lo, crie uma sala de dados virtual.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses a space before the word 'virtuală' (virtuala). It should be without the space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a partaja formularul și atribui roluri participanților pentru completarea formularului, creați Sala virtuală de date.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "assign roles to the room participants" is not perfectly translated. "Назначить роли участникам комнаты" can be interpreted as assigning roles to the room itself, rather than the participants.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чтобы предоставить доступ к форме и назначить роли участникам для ее заполнения, создайте Виртуальную комнату данных.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "для ее заполнения" is a bit clunky. It could be more naturally integrated into the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чтобы предоставить доступ к форме и назначить роли участникам для заполнения ее, создайте Виртуальную комнату данных.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබේ ආකෘතිය බෙදා හැරීම සහ එය පුරවාපොිරීම සඳහා කාමරයේ සහභාගීකරුවන්ට භූමිකා පැවරීම සඳහා' is a bit verbose and could be simplified. It literally translates to 'To share your form and for filling it, assigning roles to the room participants for'. It doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ ආකෘතිය බෙදා හැරීම සහ කාමරයේ සහභාගි කරුවන්ට භූමිකා පවරන්න, ඒ සඳහා වර්චුවල් දත්ත කාමරයක් සාදා ගන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'පැවරීම සඳහා' appears twice and is redundant. It directly translates to 'for assigning' each time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove one instance of 'පැවරීම සඳහා' to improve flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels slightly awkward. The split between the explanation and the action ('සාදන්න') could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to combine the explanation and action more smoothly. e.g., 'ආකෘතිය බෙදා හැරීම සහ කාමරයේ සහභාගි කරුවන්ට භූමිකා පවරන්න, ඒ සඳහා වර්චුවල් දත්ත කාමරයක් සාදා ගන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Да бисте поделили свој образац и доделили улоге учесницима собе да га попуне, молимо креирајте Виртуелну Собу за податке.' is a bit clunky and overly formal. A more natural translation would convey the same meaning with smoother phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да бисте поделили образац и доделили улоге учесницима, креирајте Виртуелну Собу за податке.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Виртуелну Собу за податке' can be improved. Using 'Виртуелну просторију за податке' would be more appropriate for 'Virtual Data Room'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Да бисте поделили образац и доделили улоге учесницима, креирајте Виртуелну просторију за податке.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'room participants' is not accurately translated. 'Učesnicima sobe' is a literal translation but sounds awkward. A more natural translation would be 'poticinjima' or 'unosiocima'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste podelili svoj obrazac i dodelili uloge potinicijima/unosiocima da ga popune, molimo kreirajte Virtuelnu Sobu za podatke.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a comma after 'obrazac' which may not be standard for this kind of text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Da biste podelili svoj obrazac i dodelili uloge učesnicima sobe da ga popune, molimo kreirajte Virtuelnu Sobu za podatke.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "để điền vào" (to fill in) is a bit awkward and doesn't flow naturally. It's literally 'to fill in'. A better phrasing would be more natural for Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để chia sẻ biểu mẫu của bạn và chỉ định vai trò cho những người tham gia phòng, vui lòng tạo Phòng Dữ Liệu Ảo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of "xin vui lòng" is a bit formal. While not incorrect, a slightly more conversational tone would be preferred in many contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Để chia sẻ biểu mẫu của bạn và chỉ định vai trò cho những người tham gia phòng, hãy tạo Phòng Dữ Liệu Ảo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "要共享表单并为房间成员分配填写角色，请创建虚拟数据房间" is a literal translation but doesn't quite convey the natural flow of the English sentence. '填写角色' (filling roles) is awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something like '为房间成员指定填写权限' (assign filling permissions to room members).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 要共享表单并为房间成员指定填写权限，请创建虚拟数据房间。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term '虚拟数据房间' (virtual data room) is technically correct, but a more commonly understood and accepted term in Chinese for a VDR might be '虚拟资料库' or '电子数据间'. This depends on the target audience and their familiarity with the specific terminology. Using '虚拟数据房间' might require additional explanation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 要共享表单并为房间成员指定填写权限，请创建虚拟资料库。
